item.title: Ice warnings across parts of UK as cold snap sets in
item.description: New ice warnings were issued in Scotland, England and Wales for Friday, with the coldest night of the week expected on Thursday.

item.title: UK did 'too little, too late', leading to thousands more Covid deaths, says inquiry
item.description: Report on government decision-making says delays cost 23,000 lives in the first wave in England.

item.title: Wolff sells £230m stake valuing Mercedes F1 at £4.6bn
item.description: Toto Wolff sells 15% of his shareholding in the Mercedes Formula 1 team to American billionaire George Kurtz, a deal which values the team at £4.6bn.

item.title: Channel Tunnel says UK investment 'non-viable' as it halts projects
item.description: The company claims "unsustainable" levels of taxation has made any future investments "non-viable".

item.title: Zelensky to speak to Trump after US proposes Russia-Ukraine peace plan
item.description: The plan was reportedly drafted by US and Russian officials, without Ukraine's involvement.
